(Perhaps, when Takashi becomes a god.  I'm a little confused myself in the 
list of wars.  Was the First Cybertronian War when the Cybertronians rebelled 
against the Quintessons, or when the Decepticons tried to take over?  And was 
the Second Cybertronian War when the Decepticons tried to take over, or when 
the Autobots rebelled and took back control?  And he meant Predacons in the 
3CW, not the 2nd)




Unitron:




Unitron laughed as his block worked.  "I was a Decepticon scientist stationed 
into Polyhex.  Before I went on an exodus." Unitron felt the punch hit him in 
the mid-section, but didn't seem to respond, and sent a knee towards Hot 
Rod's chin.

"Guess you really aren't a successor to Optimus Prime."
